# [Interview #977: Cosmere Q&A - 17th Shard, Entry #187](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=977#187)

#### Cheese Ninja

Nightwatcher's curses all appear to be neurological in effect, are the boons limited in any particular manner?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yes.
